authz_code.desc: use the Okta widget to get an authz code and post it to the server
authz_code.title: authz code grant flow

implicit_flow.desc: use the implicit flow to get an id token and access token
implicit_flow.title: implicit flow
implicit_flow.user_msg_end: the tokens are in the console.

implicit_flow_access_token_only.desc: use the implicit flow to get an access token
implicit_flow_access_token_only.title: implicit flow - access token only
implicit_flow_access_token_only.user_msg_end: the access token is in the console.

implicit_flow_id_token_only.desc: use the implicit flow to get an id token
implicit_flow_id_token_only.title: implicit flow - id token only
implicit_flow_id_token_only.user_msg_end: the id token is in the console.

inline_hook.desc: use an inline hook to add a claim 'external_attribute' to the id token and to the access token (implicit flow)
inline_hook.instrux: make sure that https://okta-webhooks.herokuapp.com is awake.
inline_hook.title: inline hook add claims

custom_domain.desc: use the Okta widget to get an access token from an authorization server with a custom domain
custom_domain.title: access token from custom domain
